## BasicAuthenticator.authenticate() method

Add basic authentication information to `requestOptions`<!-- -->. The basic authentication information will be set in the Authorization property of `requestOptions.headers` in the form:

Authorization: Basic &lt;<!-- -->encoded username and password<!-- -->&gt;

**Signature:**

```typescript
authenticate(requestOptions: AuthenticateOptions): Promise<void>;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

requestOptions


</td><td>

AuthenticateOptions


</td><td>

The request to augment with authentication information.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
